recipe.name: Asian BBQ Chicken
steps: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients to create marinade. Mix the chicken with the marinade.
Pan sear the chicken from both sides.

recipe.name: Asian BBQ Chicken
steps: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients to create marinade. Mix the chicken with the marinade.

recipe.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
steps: Pound garlic and ginger into a paste. Marinade chicken in the paste, along with corn flour, soy sauce, and salt.
In a wok, take some oil, saute the carrots, cabbage, onions, and bell peppers. Add tomato juice and bring to a slight boil.
Fry the chicken and add to the wok along with some stock and set to simmer.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice.
